Log in Get started for free Get started

The ultimate online exam platform for secure test delivery

Synap is a secure online exam platform for businesses, educational institutions, and training providers, offering powerful tools for creating, proctoring, and grading online exams.

Get started for free
Book a demo and activate your 14-day free trial today!

Trusted to deliver exams for startups, enterprises,
and everyone in between

Streamline, secure, and scale your assessments

Secure by design

Maintain the integrity of your exams with built-in proctoring, anti-cheat tools, and strong data protection, ensuring secure and fair assessments.

Easy to deliver

Simplify the entire assessment process with intuitive tools for authoring, scheduling, and grading, making exam management effortless and efficient.

Built to scale

Synap can easily handle everything from small groups to large-scale assessments, delivering a consistent and reliable experience for every candidate.

An all-in-one platform to transform online assessments

High-stakes assessments

Deliver secure, high-stakes online assessments at scale with AI proctoring, anti-cheat features, and real-time monitoring. Ensure exam integrity while automating processes for greater efficiency.

Synap for high-stakes assessments

Online exam preparation

Provide unlimited practice tests, realistic mock exams, and instant feedback. Enhance your learning platform with data-driven performance insights to drive success.

Synap for exam preparation

Online courses

Create engaging online courses with interactive learning materials, such as quizzes, videos, and assignments. Support knowledge retention with diverse e-learning content.

Synap for online courses

Streamline your online exam delivery processes

Authoring

Build engaging tests using multiple choice, essay, drag-and-drop, and more. Create custom question banks, set difficulty levels, and tag topics to organise your content. Our intuitive exam software makes assessment authoring simple and flexible.

Maintain exam integrity with advanced security measures

Anti-cheat features

Protect the integrity of your online assessments with anti-cheat measures such as randomised questions, time limits, and copy-paste restrictions. These tools help ensure that all test takers are evaluated fairly and consistently.

Anti-cheat features
Proctoring
Reliability
Scalability
Explore more anti-cheat features

Maintain exam integrity with advanced security measures

Proctoring

Add live or automated proctoring to detect suspicious behaviour. AI monitors things like eye movement, sound, and screen activity to help maintain test security. Choose the proctoring method that fits your needs and budget.

Anti-cheat features
Proctoring
Reliability
Scalability

Maintain exam integrity with advanced security measures

Reliability

Deliver a seamless experience with an online examination system optimised for speed and stability, even in low-bandwidth conditions. Synap’s infrastructure is built for scale, with high uptime and smooth performance for large cohorts.

Anti-cheat features
Proctoring
Reliability
Scalability
Explore more reliability features

Maintain exam integrity with advanced security measures

Scalability

Whether you're delivering online tests to 100 or 100,000 users, Synap can scale to meet your needs. The platform supports concurrent test takers across regions with consistent performance.

Anti-cheat features

Use Synap as a white-labelled solution to match your organisation's branding. Add your logo, domain, and brand colours for a seamless learner experience with no third-party branding.

Frequently asked questions

What is an online exam platform?

An online exam platform allows educators, businesses, and institutions to create, deliver, and manage exams digitally. It typically includes tools for question creation, scheduling, automated grading, and analytics. Synap’s platform offers a flexible and secure way to conduct assessments at scale, whether for education, training, or certification.

Are online exams secure on Synap?

Yes, Synap uses advanced security measures such as browser lockdown, AI-based proctoring, identity verification, and full data encryption. We are fully GDPR compliant and ISO 27001 certified, ensuring that your data is handled with the highest standards of information security.

How does online exam proctoring work?

Synap's proctoring tools use a combination of webcam monitoring, screen capture, and AI algorithms to detect unusual behavior during exams. Depending on the level of security required, you can choose from unproctored, AI-proctored, or fully human-reviewed proctoring options.

Can I create multiple-choice tests with Synap?

Absolutely. Synap supports multiple-choice, essay, fill-in-the-blank, and other question types. You can customise the number of answer options, enable randomisation, and apply automatic marking for faster results.

What are the benefits of using an online assessment platform like Synap?

Online assessment platforms offer flexibility, scalability, and real-time analytics. With Synap, you can easily create and manage tests, track learner performance, reduce administrative work, and ensure secure delivery of exams at scale.

Still have questions? Get in touch

Deliver secure online exams and courses with ease

Explore how Synap can help save you time and streamline your workload with a demo tailored to your needs.
